评论详情: We got the smallest size and were very worried it would be too big. Even out of the bag they looked huge, but he put them on and they fit great (a little loose but he just tied up the draw  string). He's 5 foot, 105 lbs. We already got him another pair in black.
These were great for our pink out day to support breast cancer

The legs are stitched tightly together in the middle. While there is room in the crotch area because the seam is low, you can’t separate your legs without pulling at/ripping the seam. No squats, stretching, or manspreading in these pants 🤷‍♂️

I ordered thinking that it was better quality.  When I saw it in the package, it looked very small. My husband wears a large. There is no reason that it should be such a small package.  Very thin for the price.  I can buy better quality clothing at Ross for a better price. These pants reminds me of scrubs. Terrible quality!
These are cheapy SHEIN pants… finding so much of my orders from Amazon are actually SHEIN items now… so annoying!! Stop selling the cheap crap and charging 4x the amount for it!
Went to iron these pants and soon as the iron hit it,it put a hole in them …nice pants but don’t iron if you plan to keep them…

评论概述: OYOANGLE Men's Drawstring Waist Flap Pocket Jogger Cargo Pants
评论详情: Very comfortable and stylish. I know they're technically "men" pants, but they fit me great. I love the color too.

I grabbed these for my teen son who enjoys wearing joggers and shorts more than jeans. The pink is pretty vivid, he's not sure he'd wear them out in public lol. However, if you like pink they are for you! He states they are pretty comfortable and stylish. Since these are not name brand, $35 does seem a little steep. However, you may not be able to find this color at your usual Ross or TJ Max.
not for people with thick thighs. but they are cute.
